history.proof: hauto lq: on use: mult_one_r unfold: Ring.sort, Ring.base, mult, Ring.AbelianGroup, Ring.mult, AbelianGroup.sort.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : Ring x, y, z : K Unable to unify "sum_n ?M2419 ?M2421 = sum_n ?M2420 ?M2421" with "mult x (plus y z) = plus (mult x y) (mult x z)".

In environment K : Ring x, y, z : K H : forall (a b : nat -> ?G) (N : nat), (forall n : nat, (n <= N)%nat -> a n = b n) -> sum_n a N = sum_n b N Unable to unify "sum_n ?M2582 ?M2584 = sum_n ?M2583 ?M2584" with "mult x (plus y z) = plus (mult x y) (mult x z)".

original: intros a b N H. apply sum_n_ext_loc. intros n H0. apply H.
